approve.name: approve
approve.description: This feature enables batch updates of multiple data entries in a list format by applying approval checks before updating.

contact.name: contact
contact.description: Customer-specific information is displayed in a card-style list. The contact history update includes a modal screen for selecting the responsible person.

employee.name: employee
employee.description: Includes functionality for switching search methods using tab display and navigating to the previous or next item in the list on the reference screen.

inputcustomer.name: inputcustomer
inputcustomer.description: This is a simple data registration example. It includes implementations where the dropdown options for Customer Category 1 and 2 are linked and where the responsible person can be selected from a shared screen.
